db_py = textwrap.dedent("""
from sqlmodel import SQLModel, create_engine, Session
import os

DATABASE_URL = os.getenv("DATABASE_URL", "sqlite:///./salt.db")
engine = create_engine(DATABASE_URL, echo=False)

def init_db():
    from .models import Report, Alert, KYRItem
    SQLModel.metadata.create_all(engine)

def get_session():
    with Session(engine) as session:
        yield session
""")

models_py = textwrap.dedent("""
from datetime import datetime
from typing import Optional
from sqlmodel import SQLModel, Field

class Report(SQLModel, table=True):
    id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, primary_key=True)
    created_at: datetime = Field(default_factory=datetime.utcnow, index=True)
    contact_email: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)
    latitude: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, index=True)
    longitude: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, index=True)
    radius_m: Optional[int] = Field(default=None)
    # e.g., 'enforcement_activity', 'language_access_violation'
    category: str = Field(index=True)
    description: str
    language: Optional[str] = Field(default="en")
    is_verified: bool = Field(default=False, index=True)
    status: str = Field(default="pending", description="pending/approved/rejected")
    # Store extra structured fields as JSON string
    extra_json: Optional[str] = Field(default=None)

class Alert(SQLModel, table=True):
    id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, primary_key=True)
    created_at: datetime = Field(default_factory=datetime.utcnow, index=True)
    title: str
    message: str
    language: Optional[str] = Field(default="en")
    latitude: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, index=True)
    longitude: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, index=True)
    radius_m: Optional[int] = Field(default=1000)

class KYRItem(SQLModel, table=True):
    id: Optional[int] = Field(default=None, primary_key=True)
    slug: str = Field(index=True, unique=True)
    title: str
    body_markdown: str
    language: str = Field(default="en", index=True)
    jurisdiction: Optional[str] = Field(default=None, index=True)
    version: str = Field(default="1.0")
    updated_at: datetime = Field(default_factory=datetime.utcnow, index=True)
""")

schemas_py = textwrap.dedent("""
from typing import Optional, Dict, Any, List
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

class GeoQuery(BaseModel):
    latitude: float
    longitude: float
    radius_m: int = Field(default=1000, ge=10, le=100000)

class ReportCreate(BaseModel):
    contact_email: Optional[str] = None
    latitude: Optional[float] = None
    longitude: Optional[float] = None
    radius_m: Optional[int] = 500
    category: str
    description: str
    language: Optional[str] = "en"
    extra: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None

class ReportRead(BaseModel):
    id: int
    category: str
    description: str
    language: Optional[str]
    latitude: Optional[float]
    longitude: Optional[float]
    radius_m: Optional[int]
    status: str
    extra: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None

class AlertCreate(BaseModel):
    title: str
    message: str
    language: Optional[str] = "en"
    latitude: Optional[float] = None
    longitude: Optional[float] = None
    radius_m: Optional[int] = 1000

class AlertRead(BaseModel):
    id: int
    title: str
    message: str
    language: Optional[str]
    latitude: Optional[float]
    longitude: Optional[float]
    radius_m: Optional[int]

class KYRCreate(BaseModel):
    slug: str
    title: str
    body_markdown: str
    language: str = "en"
    jurisdiction: Optional[str] = None
    version: Optional[str] = "1.0"

class KYRRead(BaseModel):
    id: int
    slug: str
    title: str
    body_markdown: str
    language: str
    jurisdiction: Optional[str]
    version: str
""")

reports_router = textwrap.dedent("""
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends
from sqlmodel import select
from ..db import get_session
from ..models import Report
from ..schemas import ReportCreate, ReportRead, GeoQuery
from sqlmodel import Session
from typing import List, Optional
from math import radians, cos, sin, asin, sqrt
import json

router = APIRouter()

def haversine(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2):
    R = 6371000
    phi1, phi2 = radians(lat1), radians(lat2)
    dphi = radians(lat2 - lat1)
    dlambda = radians(lon2 - lon1)
    a = sin(dphi/2)**2 + cos(phi1) * cos(phi2) * sin(dlambda/2)**2
    c = 2 * asin(sqrt(a))
    return R * c

@router.post("/", response_model=ReportRead)
def create_report(payload: ReportCreate, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    extra_json = json.dumps(payload.extra) if payload.extra else None
    item = Report(
        contact_email=payload.contact_email,
        latitude=payload.latitude,
        longitude=payload.longitude,
        radius_m=payload.radius_m,
        category=payload.category,
        description=payload.description,
        language=payload.language,
        extra_json=extra_json,
    )
    session.add(item)
    session.commit()
    session.refresh(item)
    extra = json.loads(item.extra_json) if item.extra_json else None
    return ReportRead(
        id=item.id, category=item.category, description=item.description,
        language=item.language, latitude=item.latitude, longitude=item.longitude,
        radius_m=item.radius_m, status=item.status, extra=extra
    )

@router.get("/", response_model=List[ReportRead])
def list_reports(status: Optional[str] = None, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    query = select(Report).order_by(Report.id.desc())
    if status:
        query = query.where(Report.status == status)
    results = session.exec(query).all()
    out = []
    for i in results:
        extra = json.loads(i.extra_json) if i.extra_json else None
        out.append(ReportRead(
            id=i.id, category=i.category, description=i.description, language=i.language,
            latitude=i.latitude, longitude=i.longitude, radius_m=i.radius_m, status=i.status, extra=extra
        ))
    return out

@router.post("/nearby", response_model=List[ReportRead])
def list_reports_nearby(q: GeoQuery, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    results = session.exec(select(Report)).all()
    out = []
    for i in results:
        if i.latitude is not None and i.longitude is not None:
            d = haversine(q.latitude, q.longitude, i.latitude, i.longitude)
            if d <= q.radius_m + (i.radius_m or 0):
                out.append(i)
    out.sort(key=lambda x: x.id, reverse=True)
    data = []
    for i in out:
        extra = json.loads(i.extra_json) if i.extra_json else None
        data.append(ReportRead(
            id=i.id, category=i.category, description=i.description, language=i.language,
            latitude=i.latitude, longitude=i.longitude, radius_m=i.radius_m, status=i.status, extra=extra
        ))
    return data
""")

moderation_router = textwrap.dedent("""
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlmodel import Session
from ..db import get_session
from ..models import Report

router = APIRouter()

@router.post("/reports/{report_id}/approve")
def approve_report(report_id: int, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    item = session.get(Report, report_id)
    if not item:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Not found")
    item.status = "approved"
    item.is_verified = True
    session.add(item)
    session.commit()
    return {"ok": True, "id": item.id, "status": item.status}

@router.post("/reports/{report_id}/reject")
def reject_report(report_id: int, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    item = session.get(Report, report_id)
    if not item:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Not found")
    item.status = "rejected"
    item.is_verified = False
    session.add(item)
    session.commit()
    return {"ok": True, "id": item.id, "status": item.status}
""")

metrics_router = textwrap.dedent("""
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends
from sqlmodel import select, Session
from ..db import get_session
from ..models import Report
import json
from collections import Counter

router = APIRouter()

@router.get("/language_access_summary")
def language_access_summary(session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    q = select(Report).where(Report.category == "language_access_violation", Report.status=="approved")
    reports = session.exec(q).all()
    total = len(reports)
    by_language = Counter()
    modes = Counter()
    for r in reports:
        extra = json.loads(r.extra_json) if r.extra_json else {}
        by_language[extra.get("requested_language","unknown")] += 1
        modes[extra.get("interpreter_mode","none")] += 1
    return {"total": total, "by_language": by_language, "interpreter_mode": modes}
""")

alerts_router = textwrap.dedent("""
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends
from sqlmodel import select, Session
from ..db import get_session
from ..models import Alert
from ..schemas import AlertCreate, AlertRead, GeoQuery
from typing import List
from math import radians, cos, sin, asin, sqrt

router = APIRouter()

def haversine(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2):
    R = 6371000
    phi1, phi2 = radians(lat1), radians(lat2)
    dphi = radians(lat2 - lat1)
    dlambda = radians(lon2 - lon1)
    a = sin(dphi/2)**2 + cos(phi1) * cos(phi2) * sin(dlambda/2)**2
    c = 2 * asin(sqrt(a))
    return R * c

@router.post("/", response_model=AlertRead)
def create_alert(payload: AlertCreate, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    item = Alert(**payload.dict())
    session.add(item)
    session.commit()
    session.refresh(item)
    return AlertRead(
        id=item.id, title=item.title, message=item.message, language=item.language,
        latitude=item.latitude, longitude=item.longitude, radius_m=item.radius_m
    )

@router.get("/", response_model=List[AlertRead])
def list_alerts(session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    results = session.exec(select(Alert).order_by(Alert.id.desc())).all()
    return [AlertRead(
        id=i.id, title=i.title, message=i.message, language=i.language,
        latitude=i.latitude, longitude=i.longitude, radius_m=i.radius_m
    ) for i in results]

@router.post("/nearby", response_model=List[AlertRead])
def list_alerts_nearby(q: GeoQuery, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    results = session.exec(select(Alert)).all()
    out = []
    for i in results:
        if i.latitude is not None and i.longitude is not None:
            d = haversine(q.latitude, q.longitude, i.latitude, i.longitude)
            if d <= q.radius_m + (i.radius_m or 0):
                out.append(i)
    out.sort(key=lambda x: x.id, reverse=True)
    return [AlertRead(
        id=i.id, title=i.title, message=i.message, language=i.language,
        latitude=i.latitude, longitude=i.longitude, radius_m=i.radius_m
    ) for i in out]
""")

kyr_router = textwrap.dedent("""
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlmodel import select, Session
from ..db import get_session
from ..models import KYRItem
from ..schemas import KYRCreate, KYRRead
from typing import List

router = APIRouter()

@router.post("/", response_model=KYRRead)
def create_kyr(payload: KYRCreate, session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    existing = session.exec(select(KYRItem).where(KYRItem.slug == payload.slug, KYRItem.language == payload.language)).first()
    if existing:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=409, detail="KYR item already exists for this slug/language")
    item = KYRItem(**payload.dict())
    session.add(item)
    session.commit()
    session.refresh(item)
    return KYRRead(**item.dict())

@router.get("/", response_model=List[KYRRead])
def list_kyr(language: str = "en", session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    results = session.exec(select(KYRItem).where(KYRItem.language == language).order_by(KYRItem.updated_at.desc())).all()
    return [KYRRead(**i.dict()) for i in results]

@router.get("/{slug}", response_model=KYRRead)
def get_kyr(slug: str, language: str = "en", session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    item = session.exec(select(KYRItem).where(KYRItem.slug == slug, KYRItem.language == language)).first()
    if not item:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Not found")
    return KYRRead(**item.dict())
""")

live_router = textwrap.dedent("""
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends
from sqlmodel import select, Session
from ..db import get_session
from ..models import Report
import json
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

router = APIRouter()

@router.get("/stream")
def stream_recent_reports(minutes:int=120, category:str="enforcement_activity", session: Session = Depends(get_session)):
    cutoff = datetime.utcnow() - timedelta(minutes=minutes)
    q = select(Report).where(Report.status=="approved", Report.created_at >= cutoff)
    if category:
        q = q.where(Report.category == category)
    items = session.exec(q).all()

    for r in items:
        if r.latitude is None or r.longitude is None:
            continue
        extra = json.loads(r.extra_json) if r.extra_json else {}
        out.append({
            "id": r.id,
            "lat": r.latitude,
            "lng": r.longitude,
            "ts": r.created_at.isoformat() + "Z",
            "category": r.category,
            "desc": r.description,
            "extra": extra
        })
    return {"count": len(out), "items": out}
""")

let markers = new Map();

async function refresh(){
  try{
    const res = await fetch(API + '/live/stream?minutes=180&category=enforcement_activity');
    const data = await res.json();
    const seen = new Set();
    data.items.forEach(it=>{
      const id = it.id;
      seen.add(id);
      const emoji = '';
      if(!markers.has(id)){
        const m = L.marker([it.lat, it.lng]).addTo(map)
           .bindPopup(`${emoji} <b>${it.category}</b><br>${it.desc}<br><small>${new Date(it.ts).toLocaleString()}</small>`);
        markers.set(id,m);
      } else {
        markers.get(id).setPopupContent(`${emoji} <b>${it.category}</b><br>${it.desc}<br><small>${new Date(it.ts).toLocaleString()}</small>`);
      }
    });
    // remove stale markers not in feed
    [...markers.keys()].forEach(id=>{ if(!seen.has(id)){ map.removeLayer(markers.get(id)); markers.delete(id); }});
  }catch(e){ console.warn(e); }
}

function setAPI(){
  const v = prompt('API base URL', localStorage.getItem('salt_api') || 'http://127.0.0.1:8000');
  if(v){ localStorage.setItem('salt_api', v); location.reload(); }
}

function openForm(){
  const d = prompt('Describe enforcement activity (ex: 6 agents, checkpoint, no Spanish):');
  if(!d) return;
  const lat = prompt('Latitude (e.g., 42.3314)');
  const lng = prompt('Longitude (e.g., -83.0458)');
  if(!lat || !lng) return;
  const payload = {
    category: 'enforcement_activity',
    description: d,
    latitude: Number(lat),
    longitude: Number(lng)
  };
  fetch(API + '/reports/', {method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(payload)})
    .then(r=>r.json()).then(_=>alert('Submitted. A moderator must approve before it appears on the map.'));
}

setInterval(refresh, 5000);
refresh();
</script>
</body>
</html>
""")
